title: NYT hasn’t brought Wordle to iPhone, but the clone wars are attacking the App Store
content:
Wordle clones are spreading like wildfire on the App Store. The popular word game played once a day has users craving more. After Apple wiped out nearly all the Wordle knockoffs in January, they’re back and stronger than ever.

more…

The post NYT hasn’t brought Wordle to iPhone, but the clone wars are attacking the App Store appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Wordle knockoffs are spreading like wildfire on the App Store after Apple wiped out nearly all of them in January.
